original_title: The United States of Paranoia: Or How I Stayed On the Line to Repair My Air Conditioner
overview: A middle aged black man struggles to raise his impressionable son, care for his cantankerous father, and deal with his constant racially-charged hallucinations, all while desperately trying to repair his air conditioner.
title: The United States of Paranoia: Or How I Stayed On the Line to Repair My Air Conditioner
